content.json:
## NSG Flow Logs Analytics 
---

This workbook contains some queries to characterize existing Azure traffic. Different statistics will be measured, so that anomalies can be visually identified looking at the different charts.

## Anomaly Analysis

These charts characterize your traffic so that you can find deviations from normal behavior

parameters.name: VM_RG
parameters.label: Source VM Resource Group
parameters.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where isnotempty (VM_s)
| extend VM_RG=tostring(split(VM_s,'/')[0])
| distinct VM_RG

parameters.name: VM_Name
parameters.label: Source VM Name
parameters.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where isnotempty (VM_s)
| extend VM_Name=tostring(split(VM_s,'/')[1])
| distinct VM_Name

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| where isnotempty(FlowDirection_s) and isnotempty(FlowStatus_s)
| extend FlowDirectionLong=iif(FlowDirection_s == "I", "Inbound", "Outbound")
| extend FlowStatusLong=iif(FlowStatus_s == "A", "Allowed", "Denied")
| extend FlowLabel = strcat(FlowDirectionLong, "/", FlowStatusLong)
| project TimeGenerated, InboundBytes_d, OutboundBytes_d, VM_RG, VM_name, FlowLabel, NSGList_s
| summarize sum(InboundBytes_d) by FlowLabel, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart
content.title: Ingress bytes (in and outbound flows)

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_RG, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| summarize avg(sum_Volume) by DestPortLong
| join (AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_RG, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m))
on DestPortLong
| extend DiffToAvg = round(abs(sum_Volume - avg_sum_Volume) / avg_sum_Volume, 2)
| where DiffToAvg > 0
| project TimeGenerated, DestPortLong, DiffToAvg
| render areachart

## NSG Hits Analysis

The following charts can be used to diagnose traffic arriving to a specific application

parameters.name: VM_name
parameters.label: VM Name
parameters.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where isnotempty (VM_s)
| extend VM_Name=tostring(split(VM2_s,'/')[1])
| distinct VM_Name
| where isnotempty(VM_Name)
| sort by VM_Name asc

parameters.name: NSG_name
parameters.label: NSG Name
parameters.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where isnotempty (NSGList_s)
| distinct NSGList_s
| sort by NSGList_s asc

parameters.name: NSG_rule_name
parameters.label: NSG Rule Name
parameters.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where isnotempty (NSGRule_s)
| where iif(isempty('{NSG_name}'), True, NSGList_s == '{NSG_name}')
| distinct NSGRule_s
| sort by NSGRule_s asc

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM2_s), '', split(VM2_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_name}'), True, VM_name contains '{VM_name}')
| where iif(isempty('{NSG_name}'), True, NSGList_s == '{NSG_name}')
| where iif(isempty('{NSG_rule_name}'), True, NSGRule_s == '{NSG_rule_name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| where FlowDirection_s == 'I' and FlowStatus_s == "A"
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart

content.json:
## Unified Firewall and Flow Log analysis

The following visuals demonstrate examples of Flow Log and Firewall combined analysis

parameters.name: OperationName
parameters.label: Operation Name
parameters.query: AzureDiagnostics | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} | where Category == 'AzureFirewallNetworkRule' or Category == 'AzureFirewallApplicationRule' | distinct OperationName | union (AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) | take 1 | extend OperationName='NSGFlowLog' | distinct OperationName)

parameters.name: Action
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where Category == 'AzureFirewallNetworkRule' or Category == 'AzureFirewallApplicationRule' 
| parse msg_s with blah1 "Action: " Action "." blah2
| distinct Action
| union (
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| extend Action = iff((FlowStatus_s == "A"), "Allow", iff((FlowStatus_s == "D"), "Deny", "Unknown"))
| where Action != "Unknown"
| distinct Action
)
| distinct Action

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" or Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| extend msg_original = msg_s
| extend msg_s = replace(@'. Action: Deny. Reason: SNI TLS extension was missing.', @' to no_data:no_data. Action: Deny. Rule Collection: default behavior. Rule: SNI TLS extension missing', msg_s)
| extend msg_s = replace(@'No rule matched. Proceeding with default action', @'Rule Collection: default behavior. Rule: no rule matched', msg_s)
| parse msg_s with * " Web Category: " WebCategory
| extend msg_s = replace(@'(. Web Category:).*','', msg_s)
| parse msg_s with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection ". Rule: " Rule
| extend msg_s = replace(@'(. Rule Collection:).*','', msg_s)
| parse msg_s with * ". Rule Collection Group: " RuleCollectionGroup
| extend msg_s = replace(@'(. Rule Collection Group:).*','', msg_s)
| parse msg_s with * ". Policy: " Policy
| extend msg_s = replace(@'(. Policy:).*','', msg_s)
| parse msg_s with * ". Signature: " IDSSignatureIDInt ". IDS: " IDSSignatureDescription ". Priority: " IDSPriorityInt ". Classification: " IDSClassification
| extend msg_s = replace(@'(. Signature:).*','', msg_s)
| parse msg_s with * " was DNAT'ed to " NatDestination
| extend msg_s = replace(@"( was DNAT'ed to ).*",". Action: DNAT", msg_s)
// extract Threat Intellingence info, then remove it from further parsing
| parse msg_s with * ". ThreatIntel: " ThreatIntel
| extend msg_s = replace(@'(. ThreatIntel:).*','', msg_s)
// extract URL, then remove it from further parsing
| extend URL = extract(@"(Url: )(.*)(\. Action)",2,msg_s)
| extend msg_s=replace(@"(Url: .*)(Action)",@"\2",msg_s)
// parse remaining "simple" fields
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP " to " Target ". Action: " Action
| extend 
    SourceIP = iif(SourceIP contains ":",strcat_array(split(SourceIP,":",0),""),SourceIP),
    SourcePort = iif(SourceIP contains ":",strcat_array(split(SourceIP,":",1),""),""),
    Target = iif(Target contains ":",strcat_array(split(Target,":",0),""),Target),
    TargetPort = iif(SourceIP contains ":",strcat_array(split(Target,":",1),""),""),
    Action = iif(Action contains ".",strcat_array(split(Action,".",0),""),Action),
    Policy = case(RuleCollection contains ":", split(RuleCollection, ":")[0] ,Policy),
    RuleCollectionGroup = case(RuleCollection contains ":", split(RuleCollection, ":")[1], RuleCollectionGroup),
    RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection contains ":", split(RuleCollection, ":")[2], RuleCollection),
    IDSSignatureID = tostring(IDSSignatureIDInt),
    IDSPriority = tostring(IDSPriorityInt)
| project TimeGenerated,Protocol,SourceIP,SourcePort,Target,TargetPort,URL,Action, NatDestination, OperationName,Policy,RuleCollectionGroup,RuleCollection
| order by TimeGenerated
| limit 100
| union (AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where SubType_s == "FlowLog"
| extend Protocol = iff((L4Protocol_s == "T"), "TCP", iff((L4Protocol_s == "U"), "UDP", "Unknown"))
| extend FlowDirection = iff((FlowDirection_s == "O"), "Outbound", iff((FlowDirection_s == "I"), "Inbound", "Unknown"))
| extend Action = iff((FlowStatus_s == "A"), "Allow", iff((FlowStatus_s == "D"), "Deny", "Unknown"))
| extend SourceIP = iff(isempty(SrcIP_s),split(SrcPublicIPs_s, "|")[0], SrcIP_s)
| extend Target = iff(isempty(DestIP_s),split(DestPublicIPs_s, "|")[0], DestIP_s)
| extend TargetPort = DestPort_d
| extend OperationName = "NSGFlowLog"
| project TimeGenerated, Protocol, SourceIP, Target, TargetPort, FlowDirection, Action, NSGList_s, NSGRule_s, OperationName)
| where iif(isempty('{OperationName}'), True, OperationName == '{OperationName}')
| where iif(isempty('{Action}'), True, Action == '{Action}')
| where iif(isempty('{IPaddress}'), True, (SourceIP == '{IPaddress}' or Target == '{IPaddress}'))
content.title: Outbound Allowed Flows
